"ma dannawa,mata wishwasayi.ikmaninma ma paralowa giyoth ithama shraddhawath bhakthimath pawulaka daruweku wela upadina bawa.me aathme kalata wada shasanaye diyunuwata katayuthu kirimata mata hakiwenawa athi.ee nisa me durwala sharirayakin yukthawa thawa thawath jiwath wenna mage aashawak na.namuth wena ekak wechchawe.koyi dawase marunath mama bhaya naha.mama dannawa,milanga aathmeye jathismarana gnyanayen yuktha wu pawiddek mahajanaya idiriyata awurudu kihipayakin ena bawa,mage prarthanaya eekayi."

trask aayathanaya gana danaganimata rid ha jon oto strakar,naththam ridge piya soyagena yanawa.awurudu ganakin hamu wu piya puthu dedena katha baha karamin sitina athara thura boho thorathuru huwamaru wenawa.pradhana washayenma wiparithathwaya yanu paramparika deyak bawath,eya ridwa manga hariye oto ohuta kala prathikara nisa bawath danaganna labenawa.emenma oto ge piya ha sahodariya athishayin balawath wiparithayan dedenek wana athara owun death alla gath wita asimitha balayakata himikam kiyana bawath,loran ha andi hatada thibenne ee samana balayan bawath oto prakashakara sitinawa.ee menma bankarayata gena ekthara trask eke sampathak wu sirakariyak haraha trask aayathanaya gana thorathuru danaganimata makos athulu pirisa samath wenawa.emenma kampbal ha niyojithayek puls samaga oto samipayata enne ema sthanaya pariksha kirimatayi.namuth puls ketharam uthsaha daruwath oto strakar thamange balaya bhawitha kota owunwa winasha kara damanawa.me awasthawe kampbal dadi pilissum thuwala labana athara oto maranayata path wenawa.
ayi eewata ape deta winasha karawanne?
